events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer role, highlighting five years of experience in backend development.
Application reviewed and categorized under Engineering as the candidate's experience aligns well with software development requirements.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate further steps in the hiring process.
Phone screening completed with the candidate; they demonstrated a strong understanding of software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
The candidate confirmed availability for a technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm about the role and company.
Technical interview set for May 10th at 2 PM via video call, focusing on system design and coding tasks.
